messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Spraypainting snow was Re: Varieties of Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Spray painting snow---- Put water and food coloring in squirt bottles.........or if you are so inclined, just let the boys drink lots of water  Julie S.
messages.messageBody:
Spray painting snow----

Put water and food coloring in squirt bottles.........or if you are so
inclined, just let the boys drink lots of water <grin>

Julie S.

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/9/2004 3:20:20 PM Eastern Standard Time,
arcarpenter@... writes:
"spraypainting" snow

Ooh, how do you do this?

Thanks,
Amy


Water, food coloring and spray bottles. It's easy it's fun.

glena
